title: Gryphon Networks to Present “Compliance & the TCPA: The Changing Landscape” at inContact User Conference 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 3:35 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Gryphon Networks 
BOSTON -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Gryphon Networks , the leader in marketing compliance and sales intelligence solutions, today announced the details of its participation at the 2015 inContact User Conference, taking place September 29-October 1 in Salt Lake City, Utah. 
In a session entitled, “Compliance & the TCPA: The Changing Landscape,” the company’sGeneral Counsel Melissa Fitzgerald will review the latest rulings of the Telephone Consumer Protection Act (TCPA,) which went into effect in July 2015. This session will highlight the do’s and don’ts of outbound marketing under these new regulations, including express written consent and automated dialers (ATDs.) Melissa Fitzgerald, CIPP, General Counsel, Gryphon Networks “ Compliance & the TCPA: The Changing Landscape ” In an environment constantly under regulatory scrutiny, companies that rely on outbound marketing via the telephone must ensure they are compliant with the most up-to-date regulatory requirements. As of July 10, 2015, the Federal Communications Commission’s (FCC) revisions to the TCPA went into effect, offering more clarity to an industry already inundated with class action suits. This presentation will highlight the do’s and don’ts of outbound marketing under the new ruling, and share how your business can continue to effectively market to consumers while staying clear of this regulatory tsunami. Wednesday, September 30, 2015; 4:45pm MT
